name: Alone v.1.1
description:
(Version 1.1, major changes to the original prototype)

Felix McChip, a young boy and his nameless companion are alone when the meteor strikes hit Earth. Nameless, a shadow that collects objects after the humans disappeared, finds clues to his past, and his missing friend.

(It's still in super early stages of development, but I added extra story line and narrative as my final product of my brief. Ideally I'd love to work on this more, but with the time constraints, this is what I've come up with. I still have a lot more to learn with Construct 2 but I'm going to try and keep working on this and progress even further.)

Dedicated to my little brother Terry, and special thanks to the people on my course who spurred me on as well as my wonderful boyfriend Jack for putting up with my emotional breakdowns as I made this.

Music: "Garden Music" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
